title: Astronautical
description: I created this game using Unity, C# and Photoshop. It is a 2D Pixel-Art-Game comparable to titles like 'Jetpack Joyride'. You can download it for free on Google Play.

title: Claimspartner CH
description: Early on in my career, I got the chance to work on a project for Claimspartner CH, a swiss insurance company. It was a very interesting to work on a real-world project and I gained a lot of experience.

title: WordPress
description: As an Apprentice, I worked on a lot of WordPress projects. I learned how to utilize and create custom themes, Gutenberg blocks and plugins.

title: More Projects
description: Over the course of my education, I have worked on many more projects. Some of them are not listed here, but you can find more on my GitHub profile.
